revised_title: Experiments on the Effects of Plague Bile
tldr: The author, Dr. Deidier, and John Woodward, present a series of experiments investigating the effects of bile taken from individuals who died of the plague. They find that injecting dogs with the plague bile results in symptoms similar to the human plague, including buboes, carbuncles, and gangrenous inflammation. The study provides insight into the transmission and pathology of the plague.
